amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Motion by Senator Reid to reconsider the vote by which cloture was not invoked on amendment SA 3060 (Record Vote No. 157) made in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 3060 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 40. Record Vote Number: 157.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3060 presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 3060 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Wyden.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3060 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 40. Record Vote Number: 157.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3060 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Wyden.
